modName: Soldier of Fortune - Weapon and Armor - Multilanguage
summary: This mod will add a new weapon and armor set with soldier of fortune/mercenary in mind.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Soldier of Fortune - Weapon and Armor - Multilanguage:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Small description:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]This mod will add a new weapon and armor set with soldier of fortune/mercenary in mind.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Long description:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]The (light) armor and the weapon (a bow) can be crafted at any forge or anvil.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]The armor work with male character, no tested atm with any female character.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]The armor should work with all races, tested atm on the altmer, bosmer and redguards races only.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]The armor and the bow will require:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Some perks (advanced armors and glass smithing),
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Some ingots (iron ingot, refined malachite),
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]& some leather (leather and leather strips).
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]The base damage for the bow are set on 27.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]The base armor rating for the armor are (on the Images section please).
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Not required:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]No DLC or anything required.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Item list - Armor:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Soldier of Fortune Boots
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Soldier of Fortune Doublet
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Soldier of Fortune Gloves
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Soldier of Fortune Hood
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Item list - Weapon:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Soldier of Fortune Bow
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Language:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]ENG
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]FR
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]ATM
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Credits:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Bilwit - Texture Wizard
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]TheDahaka - MOIAF - Mods Of Ice And Fire
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Kronaras - Arakh Blade - Game of Thrones
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]L0rdofWar - Witcher 2 Models
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Marinetastic - Game of Thrones mini-pack
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Nikinoodles - Cloaks of Skyrim
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]OmegaRed99 - Omegared99's Armor compilation
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Th3Wick3d1 - Witcher 2 - Viper Assassin-Blue Stripes-Roche-Ves
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Donker316 - Game of Thrones Armor Compilation
Moraelin - European Greatsword 2_01 HD

Changelog 1.0:
Soldier of Fortune Greatsword Added.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]Permissions, On Using Models/Textures In Your Mod:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]All models and textures edited/altered/created here by bilwit & setvi are open source. Be courteous and give credit where credit is due.

Special thanks:
To Eastbear (Nice screenshots) ![/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][/center]
